text: Egh kɨ nɨ ateghtɨ, nɨ uabɨ Jerusalemɨn otivamin asɨghasɨzir kamɨn ganighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Nɨ bar deraghvɨra ikiam. Egh nɨ gɨn uan inazir afeziabar mɨn aremeghtɨ, me nɨn kuam afagh gɨvaghtɨ, kɨ Jerusalem ko, an itir darazigh asɨghasɨgham.’ ” Godɨn akam inigha izir amizim Hulda, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam gumazir kabagh anigha gɨvazɨ, me akar kam inigha atrivim bagha uamategha ghue.
